## Background

## Julian Day Number

```{r echo=TRUE, results='hold'}
y <- c(2000, 1987, 1987, 1988, 1988, 1900, 1600, 1600, 837, -1000, -1000,
          -1001, -4712, -5000)

m <- c("Jan", "Jan", "Jun", "Jan", "Jun", "Jan", "Jan", "Dec", "Apr", "Jul",
       "Feb", "Aug", "Jan", "Aug")

d <-c(1.5, 27, 19.5, 27, 19.5, 1, 1, 31, 10.3, 12.5, 29, 17.9, 1.5, 1.5)

l <- length(y)

jdn <- vector("numeric", l)
dow <- vector("character", l)

for (x in 1:l) {
jdn[x] <-JulianDayNumber(y[x], which(MONTHSTR==m[x]), d[x])
dow[x] <- DayOfWeek(jdn[x])
}

df <- data.frame(y, m, d, dow, jdn)
df
```
